entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries later in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
